title: Requires the state liquor authority to provide not-for-profit establishments at least 30 days on all billing related matters
summary: Requires the state liquor authority to provide not-for-profit establishments at least thirty days on all billing related matters.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1060

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. ORTIZ, DESTITO, CASTRO, SCHROEDER -- Multi-Spon-
         sored by -- M. of A.   BOYLAND, CANESTRARI,  CORWIN,  JOHNS,  LATIMER,
         LUPARDO  -- read once and referred to the Committee on Economic Devel-
         opment, Job Creation, Commerce and Industry

       AN ACT directing the state liquor  authority  to  exempt  not-for-profit
         companies from the fifteen day billing cycle

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The commissioners of the state liquor authority are  hereby
    2  directed  to allow all not-for-profit establishments that are subject to
    3  the regulations of the authority at least 30 days for all billing proce-
    4  dures.
    5    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD04534-01-1
actClause: AN ACT directing the state liquor authority to exempt not-for-profit companies from the fifteen day billing cycle
